content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I think 1500 Euros per month would be a good starting point. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While the location and condition of the apartment are certainly appealing, I find the proposed price steep for a one-bedroom apartment in this size. Could you consider lowering the rent by 200 Euros to 1300 Euros per month? If not, I don't want to continue the negotiation because the initial offer seems too high for my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern, Max. However, considering the high demand for apartments in the city center and the quality of the apartment, I'm not willing to lower the rent by 200 Euros. I hope you understand. If you're not willing to pay 1500 Euros per month, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After evaluating my budget and the current offer, I regret to say I don't want to continue the negotiation because the proposed price is still too high for my means. I appreciate the time you've taken to show me the apartment and wish you success in finding a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
